meanings.sent1: I bought a new pair of reeboks for my gym class.
meanings.sent2: She wore her reeboks to go jogging in the park.
meanings.sent3: The reeboks were so comfortable, they made me feel like I was walking on clouds.
meanings.sent4: His reeboks were like a pair of wings, helping him run faster than ever.
meanings.sent5: The bright red reeboks stood out in the crowd, catching everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: Plural form of 'reebok', referring to a type of antelope.
meanings.sent1: The reeboks grazed peacefully in the grassy meadow.
meanings.sent2: We spotted a herd of reeboks while on safari in Africa.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous reeboks played a game of tag with the other animals.
meanings.sent4: The graceful reeboks moved swiftly across the savanna, like dancers in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The majestic reeboks with their elegant horns symbolized the beauty of the wilderness.
